name: WONDERJUNK
description:
Turn an old Minitel into a crazy junk robot and test your shooting skills against it.

(FR : Transformez un vieux Minitel en un robot loufoque fait de débris pour tester votre adresse au combat!)

Game made during Pot-Au-Jeu french gamejam : https://itch.io/jam/pot-au-jeu

Credits :

Code & Music - Séverin (Argl) @SoulGameStudio
Art - Ludo (Loud) Discord

Controls :
Xbox Controller :
A = Shoot/Repair
Joystick = Move

Keyboard :
Space = Shoot/Repair
Arrows or ZQSD

Resources :
Sfx : soundBible.com, freesound.org
Particles : SimpleFx
Font : Teslafont
